data.persona: I am a juror on a case. I am not sure I should be in a court room. I wear all black almost every day.
data.description:
You are in the Hidden passage.
A rough, narrow passageway descends through the thick outer wall of the church. Stair-like stones lead downward into darkness.
The fat rats is here.

You are carrying a Quill and a scroll, wearing a shoes, and wielding a ritual knife.

data.short_motivation: I want to send the fat rats on an errand
data.mid_motivation: I want the fat rats to give the scroll to the priest today
data.long_motivation: I hope the priest manages to escape the purge in the coming weeks
